CheckTitle: Ensure that servers have defined descriptions
Description: Checks that IONOS servers have defined descriptions to improve documentation and resource management.
Risk: The lack of descriptions on servers can make it difficult to identify their purpose or role, complicating management and maintenance.

Code.CLI: Update the server description through the web console or via the IONOS API

Recommendation.Text: Define clear and concise descriptions for all servers that indicate their purpose, application, or environment.

Notes: Server descriptions are important for good infrastructure management and documentation.
